page.title: 11Social Concerns: The Old
page.content: VOLUNTARY WORK:S.V.P:help with shopping hot meals provided, voluteers visit & give help and advice. ST JOHN'S CHURCH :annual outings arranged, transport for hospital treatment and visits,help with gardening, shopping etc. TRINITY METHODIST CHURCH: club for the old with guest speakers. WRVS: luncheon clubs, 'books-on-wheels', hospital visiting etc. OFFICIAL PROVISION: Trafford provide Old People's Homes, warden-controlled accommodation, home helps, meals-on-wheels (delivered by volunteers), bus and train passes, free chiropody etc. PRIVATE PROVISION: numerous Rest Homes, Nursing Homes,and sheltered accommodation. Cut-price theatre and cinema tickets, cheap hairdressing etc.
